p:
The literature search yielded 3718 records through the two databases (PubMed and Scopus). After removing duplicates, 1315 unique publications were identified as potentially relevant references and were screened using titles, abstracts and keywords. Out of these screened articles, 139 full texts were assessed for eligibility. A total of 124 references were selected and presented in this review, including 75 additional articles retrieved after screening the reference lists of the eligible papers given that the 49 retrieved published papers met at least one of the inclusion criteria. The flow diagram in
Fig 1 shows the search process. The PRISMA check list, the search strategies, and the results for the consulted databases are provided in
S1 and S2 Tables respectively.
